The version shipped in Fedora doesn't have any of the known gadget-chains (from ysoserial) in the classpath. The exploit in the blogpost leveraged that gradle-2.12 depends on apache-commons-collections-3.2.1. This is not the case in Fedora 24, where it already depends on apache-commons-collection-3.2.2, which fixed the vulnerability [1].
[1] https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/COLLECTIONS-580
